definitions.definition: An exciting or extraordinary scene, exhibition, performance etc.
examples: The horse race was a thrilling spectacle .

definitions.definition: An embarrassing or unedifying scene or situation.
examples: He made a spectacle out of himself.

definitions.definition: A frame with different coloured lenses on a semaphore signal through which light from a lamp shines at night, often a part of the signal arm.

main_definition: An exciting or extraordinary scene, exhibition, performance etc.
secondary_definitions: An embarrassing or unedifying scene or situation.
( rail transport ) A frame with different coloured lenses on a semaphore signal through which light from a lamp shines at night, often a part of the signal arm.
